ygData.subject: Re: Something...
ygData.msgSnippet: Troll Shadow Knights are surpose to be good??? Come on, they level up at a snail place (25% pentalty for being a hybrid class, additional 50% for being a troll
ygData.messageBody:
Troll Shadow Knights are surpose to be good??? Come on, they level up at a
snail place (25% pentalty for being a hybrid class, additional 50% for being a
troll I think) and Harm touch is useless as it can be resisted.

That's why you hear a lot of SK complaning on why they are weaker then
Paladins.

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Yep, no more agnostic for necro. This is becoz too many pple wanna get the
> goodies from TSK or Necro but yet wanna enjoy good faction after killing
> hundreds of orcs by selecting agnostic (coz it help in improving ya
> faction). Afterall evil classes are made more powerful to compensate their
> faction hit.
>
> Dark Elf alone shld be quite easy to improve faction - Kenven once did it
> b4 as a DE warrior, by killing many orcs and he can enter Freeport at lvl 9
> I think (but some npc merchants at commonlands still refuse to do biz with
> him). But DEN is more evil, so u will need more time to gain good faction.
>
> Why not we create a Dark Elves/Trolls evil team, forget abt the good
> faction thingy and bash the good races city, hehe. I read some high lvl
> dark elf wizards/shadow knights actually attack Freeport guards in other
> servers (no need to find monsters to hunt, lol), sound kewl!
>
> Btw, Leshrec also got a DEN in Prexus server.
>
> Mondain
>

> > hi all,
> > it seems that quite abit had happened over the pass weekend when i
> wasnt around... the party got formed... n stuff like that... n ive readup
> abit on the few websites over the weekend... i think in general... the
> necromancer has spells that spread over a pretty wide range... from
> summoning... to direct damage... to healing... that no one spellcasting
> class can provide... however this is with the drawback of faction.... so i
> guess my first char in EQ will most likely be a Necromancer... but i havent
> decide to make a Erudite or Dark Elf Necro ... most likely Dark Elf... but
> i think i need to do more research on faction n stuff like that.... maybe
> some of u guys can help me out here... esp Leshrec...
> > 1. is it that bad that a Dark Elf Necro is KOS in other towns/cities?
> > 2. how difficult is to be able to better the faction so that one can
> enter those cities without KOS? n how can u do it?
> > 3. what about Eruite Necro?
> >
> > Pls advice :) although i havent got my EQ here yet... but i would
> like to be fully prepared fer it b4 it comes... :) hopefully within this
> week... otherwise next... as i can only play during the weekend... BTW...
> count me in... in ya guild.... i should be in the same server as u guys...
> but i guess i will be progressing slowly... most likely i will be using
> SilverHand. :)
> >
> > Also, not sure about Trade Skills... anyone has any advice fer
> Necros? Also, u think it will be better to have 1 trade skills on a char
> rather than 2? or does it matter? thats all i got fer now...
> >
